title: DT Swiss ARC Disc wide tubeless TT/Tri wheel is superlight, super aero, super fast
content:
The new DT Swiss ARC 1100 Dicut Disc carbon rear wheel promises to speed up long distance races against the clock, with light weight and improved aerodynamics to round out their ARC aero road wheel lineup. DT calls the disc brake only, tubeless ARC Disc wheel the fastest they’ve built, optimized for modern wide 28mm […]

The post DT Swiss ARC Disc wide tubeless TT/Tri wheel is superlight, super aero, super fast appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
